Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have an AMD graphics card, you have to set the shadow quality to low for it to work properly.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have an AMD graphics card, you have to set the shadow quality to low for it to work properly.
